original_text: When Jonah’s warning reached the king of Nineveh, he rose from his throne, took off his royal robes, covered himself with sackcloth and sat down in the dust.
korean_text: 그 일이 니느웨 왕에게 들리매 왕이 보좌에서 일어나 왕복을 벗고 굵은 베 옷을 입고 재 위에 앉으니라

sentences.original_text: When Jonah's warning reached the king of Nineveh
sentences.korean_translation: 요나의 경고가 니느웨 왕에게 전달되었을 때

sentences.original_text: and sat down in the dust
